General.Name: Guangzhou Metro Design And Research
General.Description: Guangzhou Metro Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. provides engineering consultancy services. The company provides professional technical services, including survey and design, planning consultation, and general contracting for rail transit, municipal, construction, and other construction projects. It also offers measurement services; standardization services; planning and design management; engineering management services; environmental protection monitoring; geological surveys; geological survey technical services; professional design services; fire protection technical services; disaster risk assessment; national land space planning; special equipment inspection and testing services; water conservancy project quality inspection; indoor environment inspection; safety production inspection and inspection; construction project quality inspection; cultural relics protection engineering survey and design; construction engineering survey; special equipment design; geological disaster management engineering design; railway rolling stock design; civil air defense engineering design; and building intelligent system design services, as well as engages in project cost consulting business. The company is headquartered in Guangzhou, China. Guangzhou Metro Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Metro Group Co., Ltd.
